author: Ann Killion
title: Against UCLA, Bears get another chance in spotlight
text:
Photo: Gene Sweeney Jr., Getty Images Head coach Sonny Dykes and the Cal football team ran into their first roadblock of the season on Oct. 10, losing at No. 5 Utah. Head coach Sonny Dykes and the Cal football team ran into their...
